snippet: Wall Street doesn't exactly love the idea of higher taxes, but a proposal in France looks much scarier than anything being discussed here. | A report on the global banking industry suggests that some lenders may be forced to put themselves up for...
abstract: Wall Street doesn't exactly love the idea of higher taxes, but a proposal in France looks much scarier than anything being discussed here. | A report on the global banking industry suggests that some lenders may be forced to put themselves up for sale. | Ireland is close to passing a law that could help struggling homeowners. | Max W. Berger, the plaintiffs lawyer, isn't celebrating his six major securities class-action settlements.
